feed.title: North East Margaree - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , North East Margaree
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:07 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North East Margaree 09:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: 2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 2.1°C
Wind: NNE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers ending this afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1 except minus 5 over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1 except minus 5 over the Highlands. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero except minus 3 over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Snow mixed with ice pellets in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High zero except minus 3 over the Highlands. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Freezing rain or snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or snow. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
